mapper.sql: t.area_code AS "areaCode", t.parent_code AS "parentCode", t.parent_codes AS "parentCodes", t.tree_sort AS "treeSort", t.tree_names AS "treeNames", t.tree_leaf AS "treeLeaf", t.tree_level AS "treeLevel", t.area_name AS "areaName", t.area_type AS "areaType", t.status AS "status", t.create_by AS "createBy", t.create_time AS "createTime", t.update_by AS "updateBy", t.update_time AS "updateTime", t.remarks AS "remarks",
